languages.text: "Осталось расправиться с изменниками на нижнем уровне. Моя... последняя битва, посвященная служению священному Дитя". {n}Теобальд с тоской глядит на бессознательное тело Кассии.{/n} "Я приведу Дитя в чувство — не беспокойтесь, могущество наследницы Дома Орселлио поможет нам сокрушить врагов и оградит Дитя от сил Фелека. А вы... отдохните пока перед битвой".

traits.locale_text: "Осталось расправиться с изменниками на нижнем уровне. Моя... последняя битва, посвященная служению священному Дитя". {n}Теобальд с тоской глядит на бессознательное тело Кассии.{/n} "Я приведу Дитя в чувство — не беспокойтесь, могущество наследницы Дома Орселлио поможет нам сокрушить врагов и оградит Дитя от сил Фелека. А вы... отдохните пока перед битвой".

languages.text: "The last thing, then, is to deal with the traitors on the lower level. My... final battle in the service of the sacred Child." {n}Theobald looks wistfully at Cassia's insensate form.{/n} "I will revive the Child — do not be alarmed, the power of House Orsellio's heir will help us to destroy our enemies and shield the Child from Felek's forces. But you... rest for a time before the battle."
languages.original_text: "Осталось расправиться с изменниками на нижнем уровне. Моя... последняя битва, посвященная служению священному Дитя". {n}Теобальд с тоской глядит на бессознательное тело Кассии.{/n} "Я приведу Дитя в чувство — не беспокойтесь, могущество наследницы Дома Орселлио поможет нам сокрушить врагов и оградит Дитя от сил Фелека. А вы... отдохните пока перед битвой".

traits.locale_text: "The last thing, then, is to deal with the traitors on the lower level. My... final battle in the service of the sacred Child." {n}Theobald looks wistfully at Cassia's insensate form.{/n} "I will revive the Child — do not be alarmed, the power of House Orsellio's heir will help us to destroy our enemies and shield the Child from Felek's forces. But you... rest for a time before the battle."

"The last thing, then, is to deal with the traitors on the lower level. My... final battle in the service of the sacred Child." {n}Theobald looks wistfully at Cassia's insensate form.{/n} "I will revive the Child — do not be alarmed, the power of House Orsellio's heir will help us to destroy our enemies and shield the Child from Felek's forces. But you... rest for a time before the battle."

My... final battle in the service of the sacred Child." {n}Theobald looks wistfully at Cassia's insensate form.{/n} "I will revive the Child — do not be alarmed, the power of House Orsellio's heir will help us to destroy our enemies and shield the Child from Felek's forces. But you... rest for a time before the battle."

"The last thing, then, is to deal with the traitors on the lower level. My... final battle in the service of the sacred Child." {n}Theobald looks wistfully at Cassia's insensate form.{/n} "I will revive the Child — do not be alarmed, the power of House Orsellio's heir will help us to destroy our enemies and shield the Child from Felek's forces. But you... rest for a time before the battle."

languages.text: “既然如此，那么只剩下一件事情要做了——消灭下层的叛徒。这是我……为了圣子的最后一战。”{n}西奥巴德恋恋不舍地看着不省人事的卡西娅。{/n}“不必惊慌，我会唤醒圣子。奥赛罗家族的继承人会利用她的力量帮助我们消灭敌人，保护我们不受费雷克那边导航者的影响。不过你……在战斗开始之前，先休息休息吧。”
languages.original_text: "The last thing, then, is to deal with the traitors on the lower level. My... final battle in the service of the sacred Child." {n}Theobald looks wistfully at Cassia's insensate form.{/n} "I will revive the Child — do not be alarmed, the power of House Orsellio's heir will help us to destroy our enemies and shield the Child from Felek's forces. But you... rest for a time before the battle."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，那么只剩下一件事情要做了——消灭下层的叛徒。这是我……为了圣子的最后一战。”{n}西奥巴德恋恋不舍地看着不省人事的卡西娅。{/n}“不必惊慌，我会唤醒这个孩子。奥塞罗家族的继承人会利用她的力量帮助我们消灭敌人，保护我们不受费雷克那边导航者的影响。不过你……在战斗开始之前，先休息休息吧。”

languages.text: «Solo resta entonces lidiar con los traidores del nivel inferior. Mi... última batalla al servicio de la niña sagrada». {n}Theobald lanza una mirada melancólica al cuerpo inmóvil de Cassia.{/n} «Reanimaré a la niña. No se alarme; el poder de la heredera de la casa Orsellio nos ayudará a destruir a nuestros enemigos y nos protegerá de la fuerza de Navegantes de Felek. Pero usted... debería descansar un poco antes de la batalla».
languages.original_text: "The last thing, then, is to deal with the traitors on the lower level. My... final battle in the service of the sacred Child." {n}Theobald looks wistfully at Cassia's insensate form.{/n} "I will revive the Child — do not be alarmed, the power of House Orsellio's heir will help us to destroy our enemies and shield the Child from Felek's forces. But you... rest for a time before the battle."

traits.locale_text: «Solo resta entonces lidiar con los traidores del nivel inferior. Mi... última batalla al servicio de la niña sagrada». {n}Theobald lanza una mirada melancólica al cuerpo inmóvil de Cassia.{/n} «Reanimaré a la niña. No se alarme; el poder de la heredera de la casa Orsellio nos ayudará a destruir a nuestros enemigos y nos protegerá de la fuerza de Navegantes de Felek. Pero usted... debería descansar un poco antes de la batalla».

languages.text: 「最後に、下層部の裏切り者を始末することだ。これが私の…聖なる『子ども』のもとでの最後の戦いだ」{n}テオバルドは感覚を失ったカシアの姿を切なげに見つめる。{/n}「私は『子ども』を蘇らせる …そう警戒するな。オーセリオ家の後継者の力は、敵を殲滅し、フェレックの航宙士の力から身を守るのに役立つだろう。だが…まずは戦いの前にしばらく身体を休めるといい」
languages.original_text: "The last thing, then, is to deal with the traitors on the lower level. My... final battle in the service of the sacred Child." {n}Theobald looks wistfully at Cassia's insensate form.{/n} "I will revive the Child — do not be alarmed, the power of House Orsellio's heir will help us to destroy our enemies and shield the Child from Felek's forces. But you... rest for a time before the battle."

traits.locale_text: 「最後に、下層部の裏切り者を始末することだ。これが私の…聖なる『子ども』のもとでの最後の戦いだ」{n}テオバルドは感覚を失ったカシアの姿を切なげに見つめる。{/n}「私は『子ども』を蘇らせる …そう警戒するな。オーセリオ家の後継者の力は、敵を殲滅し、フェレックの航宙士の力から身を守るのに役立つだろう。だが…まずは戦いの前にしばらく身体を休めるといい」

languages.text: "Dann bleibt nur, sich um die Verräter auf dem unteren Deck zu kümmern. Mein ... letzter Kampf im Dienst des heiligen Kinds." {n}Theobald blickt wehmütig auf Cassias reglose Gestalt.{/n} "Ich werde das Kind wiederbeleben — keine Sorge, die Macht der Erbin des Hauses Orsellio wird uns helfen, unsere Feinde zu vernichten, und das Schild vor den Feleks Truppen beschützen. Ihr aber ... solltet Euch vor dem Kampf etwas ausruhen."
languages.original_text: "The last thing, then, is to deal with the traitors on the lower level. My... final battle in the service of the sacred Child." {n}Theobald looks wistfully at Cassia's insensate form.{/n} "I will revive the Child — do not be alarmed, the power of House Orsellio's heir will help us to destroy our enemies and shield the Child from Felek's forces. But you... rest for a time before the battle."

traits.locale_text: "Dann bleibt nur, sich um die Verräter auf dem unteren Deck zu kümmern. Mein ... letzter Kampf im Dienst des heiligen Kinds." {n}Theobald blickt wehmütig auf Cassias reglose Gestalt.{/n} "Ich werde das Kind wiederbeleben — keine Sorge, die Macht der Erbin des Hauses Orsellio wird uns helfen, unsere Feinde zu vernichten, und das Schild vor den Feleks Truppen beschützen. Ihr aber ... solltet Euch vor dem Kampf etwas ausruhen."

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, il ne me reste plus qu'à m'occuper des traîtres du niveau inférieur. Ce sera... mon dernier combat au service de l'Enfant sacrée. » {n}Théobald lance un regard mélancolique au corps inanimé de Cassia.{/n} « Je vais la ranimer. N'ayez crainte, la puissance de la maison Orsellio nous aidera à vaincre nos ennemis et à la protéger des troupes de Felek. Mais vous... vous devriez vous reposer avant la bataille. »
languages.original_text: "The last thing, then, is to deal with the traitors on the lower level. My... final battle in the service of the sacred Child." {n}Theobald looks wistfully at Cassia's insensate form.{/n} "I will revive the Child — do not be alarmed, the power of House Orsellio's heir will help us to destroy our enemies and shield the Child from Felek's forces. But you... rest for a time before the battle."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, il ne me reste plus qu'à m'occuper des traîtres du niveau inférieur. Ce sera... mon dernier combat au service de l'Enfant sacrée. » {n}Théobald lance un regard mélancolique au corps inanimé de Cassia.{/n} « Je vais la ranimer. N'ayez crainte, la puissance de la maison Orsellio nous aidera à vaincre nos ennemis et à la protéger des troupes de Felek. Mais vous... vous devriez vous reposer avant la bataille. »

languages.text: "Geriye yalnızca aşağı seviyelerdeki hainlerle ilgilenmek kalıyor. Kutsal Çocuk'un hizmetindeki son savaşım." {n}Theobald, Cassia'nın şuursuz bedenine efkârlı bir şekilde bakıyor.{/n} "Çocuk'u uyandıracağım. Merak etme, Orsellio Hanesi'nin vârisinin gücü, düşmanlarımızı yok etmemizde bize yardım eder ve bizi Felek'in kuvvetlerine karşı korur. Yalnız sen... Çatışmadan önce bir süre dinlen."
languages.original_text: "The last thing, then, is to deal with the traitors on the lower level. My... final battle in the service of the sacred Child." {n}Theobald looks wistfully at Cassia's insensate form.{/n} "I will revive the Child — do not be alarmed, the power of House Orsellio's heir will help us to destroy our enemies and shield the Child from Felek's forces. But you... rest for a time before the battle."

traits.locale_text: "Geriye yalnızca aşağı seviyelerdeki hainlerle ilgilenmek kalıyor. Kutsal Çocuk'un hizmetindeki son savaşım." {n}Theobald, Cassia'nın şuursuz bedenine efkârlı bir şekilde bakıyor.{/n} "Çocuk'u uyandıracağım. Merak etme, Orsellio Hanesi'nin vârisinin gücü, düşmanlarımızı yok etmemizde bize yardım eder ve bizi Felek'in kuvvetlerine karşı korur. Yalnız sen... Çatışmadan önce bir süre dinlen."
